resources.string: accessibility permission for custom volume control panel

🎛️ About the App 🎚️

 Welcome! This app is designed for custom volume control for CMF PHONE 1, but keep in mind: this is a fun and experimental project!
 It may have a lot of bugs, but if you'd like, you can help improve it. 😃


🔹 How to Enable It?
 1️⃣ Grant Necessary Permissions:
 go to Settings > Accessibility and find the app.
 Make sure to grant the necessary accessibility permissions for the app to function properly.

 2️⃣ Run the app and enjoy quick custom volume control!


🚀 Contribute to Development
 If you have ideas or want to contribute, feel free to join us on GitHub! The project is open-source, and you can submit issues or pull requests.


📌 GitHub Repository: https://github.com/alirezafarghadani999/CMF_CustomVolumeControl 


👨‍💻 Developed by: Alireza
